disease_preventions.name: Malaria
preventions: Apply insect repellent on exposed skin

disease_preventions.name: Tuberculosis
preventions: Ensure proper ventilation in living spaces
Cover mouth while coughing or sneezing
Complete full course of TB vaccination and treatment

disease_preventions.name: COVID-19
preventions: Get vaccinated and follow booster recommendations
Avoid crowded and poorly ventilated spaces

disease_preventions.name: Influenza
preventions: Avoid close contact with sick people
Cover mouth while coughing or sneezing

disease_preventions.name: Dengue Fever
preventions: Remove stagnant water around living areas
Keep surroundings clean to prevent mosquito breeding

disease_preventions.name: Typhoid Fever
preventions: Avoid street food and unwashed fruits
Get vaccinated if traveling to high-risk areas

disease_preventions.name: Asthma
preventions: Avoid exposure to allergens and irritants

disease_preventions.name: Mumps
preventions: Avoid close contact with infected people

disease_preventions.name: Chickenpox
preventions: Avoid close contact with infected individuals

disease_preventions.name: Hepatitis B
preventions: Avoid sharing needles or personal items

disease_preventions.name: Ebola Virus Disease
preventions: Avoid contact with infected people and animals
Use protective equipment when caring for patients

disease_preventions.name: Zika Virus
preventions: Remove stagnant water to prevent mosquito breeding
Avoid travel to high-risk areas if pregnant

disease_preventions.name: Polio
preventions: Get vaccinated with IPV or OPV

disease_preventions.name: Leprosy
preventions: Early detection and treatment of patients
Avoid prolonged close contact with untreated patients

disease_preventions.name: Rabies
preventions: Wash bites and seek immediate medical care

disease_preventions.name: Plague
preventions: Use insect repellent to prevent flea bites

disease_preventions.name: Lyme Disease
preventions: Use tick repellents and protective clothing
Check body for ticks after outdoor activities

disease_preventions.name: Smallpox
preventions: Vaccination (no longer routine, but key historically)

disease_preventions.name: Anthrax
preventions: Use protective equipment when handling livestock
Vaccinate livestock if in endemic areas

disease_preventions.name: H1N1 Influenza
preventions: Avoid close contact with sick people
Cover mouth while coughing or sneezing

disease_preventions.name: Scarlet Fever
preventions: Avoid close contact with infected individuals

disease_preventions.name: Meningitis
preventions: Avoid close contact with infected individuals

disease_preventions.name: Tetanus
preventions: Seek medical care for deep cuts or injuries

disease_preventions.name: Giardiasis
preventions: Avoid swallowing untreated water from lakes or rivers

disease_preventions.name: Ascariasis
preventions: Avoid consuming raw or unwashed vegetables

disease_preventions.name: Schistosomiasis
preventions: Avoid swimming in freshwater in endemic areas
Use safe water for drinking and bathing
